Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Oho, there you are again! <sp:5:1:0>The day has
hardly dawned, and yet the smell of my
cooking is impossible to resist.
Talk_0010_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ah, there you are! <sp:5:1:0>Proof that my cooking
can draw a hungry audience even in the
foulest weather.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Are you...a traveler? <sp:5:0:0>Lured here by the
aroma of my cooking, I imagine.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00><clr:0000>Captain Toren's squad of the monster-
control crew <clr:ffff>is executing a strike ahead.<sp:5:0:0>
Careful you're not caught up in it.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>The captain left that weapon here <sp:5:0:0>so that
I might defend myself when left to guard
the camp.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>But so long as I live, this chef's only
weapon will be this ladle! <sp:5:0:0>You're welcome
to use that blade as you see fit though.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Did you...<sp:5:0:0>come here knowing that this
is the camp for <clr:0000>Captain Toren's squad of
the monster-control crew<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00><clr:0000>Captain Toren's squad of the monster-
control crew<clr:ffff> is mobilizing nearby. <sp:5:0:0>Tread
carelessly and you may get involved.
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>The squad members left that weapon
behind for my self-defense.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But I've never wielded anything heftier
than a ladle! <sp:5:0:0>I'd be grateful if you could
put it to good use.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This camp belongs to <clr:0000>Captain Toren's
squad of the monster-control crew<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>They
are executing a major strike as we speak.
I recommend you clear the area before
things get hectic.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Sometimes monsters can get the better of
even the most elite fighters. <sp:5:0:0>I hope our
squad is safely able to claim victory...
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Captain Toren's squad is now leading a
dangerous and important strike. Mind that
your curiosity doesn't get you involved.
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I've heard they're dealing with some
troublesome foes. I can only pray they'll
be all right.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>The <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> that serves as the monsters'
base is <clr:0000>up the hill and down the road<clr:ffff>,
but even here we might be in danger.
Captain Toren is on his way there now
to clear those monsters out.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>It was your appetite that brought you
here, yes? <sp:5:0:0>Have some of this. It's one
of my specialties.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01><clr:0000>Akkala Span<clr:ffff> is down the road from here.
The squad's mission is to strike at the
monsters that have taken it over.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>As the squad's chef, I stayed behind.<sp:5:0:0>
I may not swing a sword, but my ladle
prepares meals worthy of this elite team.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>If you followed your nose here, you must
be hungry. <sp:5:0:0>Take this. It's one of my
personal specialties.
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Of the three monster-control-crew
squads, Captain Toren's is the cream of
the crop.
I consider myself fortunate to serve them
meals befitting their premier status.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Your growling stomach led you to me, did
it not? <sp:5:0:0>I'm happy to share my cooking
with you, if you'd like.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The members of Captain Toren's squad
are skilled, but they get hungry quickly.<sp:0:4:0>I'm worried that their hunger may
distract them, allowing a monster to
catch them unawares.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>How I wish they had <clr:0000>someone to aid them<clr:ffff>
should their appetites waylay them...
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>It's the duty of an elite squad to confront
powerful foes, and I know they're up to
the task.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0301>But this fight comes right on the heels
of the one in Eldin, so I worry they might
be exhausted.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I would feel a lot better if they had a
<clr:0000>skilled ally<clr:ffff> to assist them.
Near_0001: A dish worthy of the elite...
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Hm? <sp:5:1:0>Your pouch is almost spilling over
with food. Oh well. I suppose you'll have
to wait to try my cooking.
Talk_0010_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Hello again! <sp:5:1:0>Lured back by a craving for
my cuisine, I presume?
Talk_0010_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Welcome back! <sp:5:1:0>It's only natural you would
dream of my cooking as night falls.
